SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you!<sp:5:0:0> I can't believe I was rescued

Com_Talk_05b: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Come on! I'm ready to buy more!
Com_Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm proud to offer all of these goods.<sp:5:1:0>

SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That was scary!<sp:5:0:0> Thanks for saving

SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>That was amazing! You're so powerful.<sp:5:1:0>

Com_Talk_05c: <sp:3:0:2:0701>I'd really like to buy more from you!

<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0001><clr:ffff>All right. So, how many do you want
to sell?
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You rescued me!<sp:5:0:0> I thought my mushrooms
were going to get stolen!
ShopGreet_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You've helped me out so much, so it
seems only right that I should offer you
my mushrooms. A special sale!
Com_Talk_16:

have on, remove it first, all right?
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's all thanks to you that my mushrooms
are safeâ€”and me, of course!

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Here's a token of my appreciation. Don't

SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I thought I was a goner. I'm so glad you
came in right then!
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ouch! Oooh...<sp:5:0:0> I was in an awful fix there!<sp:5:1:0>

SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Thank you!<sp:5:1:0> Traveling is nice and all, but

Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I was nearly done for... Wasn't there some

about made my peace with the Goddess!
Sorry, sorry...<sp:5:0:0> Just scared, that's all...
Com_Talk_36:

Com_Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks to you, I've run out of stock
today. Thank you for buying so much!

I may not have anything to sell now...<sp:5:0:0>but

Com_Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Look at this weather we're having. Not

Atacked01:

could have survived on my own.

<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>What IS that?! I wouldn't stand a chance

ShopGoodBye_01:

ShopGreet_00:

ShopGreet_01:
